page.title: 13BEING ILL
page.content: My name is Deena Morgan.I am eleven years old,and I have just recovered from tonsilitis.Tonsilitis is a throat infection.When you get it you have a high temperature,but you feel cold.I went to bed and my mum gave me a Locket which she had bought from the shop.Lockets are sweets,but they have a kind of medicine inside them.The next day I had to go to the doctors.A doctor is a person you go to see if you are ill,and he gives you tablets or medicine.Medicine is a liquid that makes you better.Tablets are little hard cubes of medicine,but mostly they are round.I had medicine which was yellow and it tasted nice.Most medicines taste horrible!I had to take my medicine three times a day.I had two days off school,but now I'm back thanks to the doctor.I still have to take medicine to make sure I'm well.
